title: Little Scares
description: Little Scares is a thrilling browser-based game where you play as a mischievous ghost strategically haunting a house before time runs out.

title: Hackboard
description: This Kanban app, built as part of my Ironhack web development bootcamp, demonstrates my React skills in single-page application development, JSON data handling, routing, and integration of third-party libraries.
